price: ឬច្រើនជាងពាក់កណ្ដាលយប់បន្ដិច។ ហើយចូរអ្នកសូត្រគម្ពីរ គួរអានតាមបែបបទយឺតៗ និងឱ្យច្បាស់លាស់។
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
